text: Ara upasthapita kara habe ‘amalanama, takhana tate ya lipibad'dha ache tara karane apani aparadhiderake dekhabena atankagrasta ebam tara balabe, ‘haya, durbhagya amadera! Eta kemana grantha! Eta to chota bara kichu bada na diye saba kichu'i hiseba kare rekheche [1].’ Ara tara ya amala kareche ta samane upasthita pabe [2]; ara apanara raba to karo prati yuluma karena na
